resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index",
    mappings={
        "dynamic_templates": [
            {
                "geo_point": {
                    "mapping": {
                        "type": "geo_point"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.bulk(
    operations=[
        {
            "index": {
                "_index": "my_index",
                "_id": "1",
                "dynamic_templates": {
                    "work_location": "geo_point"
                }
            }
        },
        {
            "field": "value1",
            "work_location": "41.12,-71.34",

        },

            "create": {
                "_index": "my_index",
                "_id": "2",

                    "home_location": "geo_point"
                }
            }
        },

            "field": "value2",

        }
    ],
